SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APIResponse
Standard API response wrapper for consistent error and success responses.
AppConfig
Application configuration class for common beans and utilities.
AuthController
REST Controller for handling authentication-related operations.
AuthService
Service interface for authentication and user management operations.
AuthserviceApplication
Main application class for the Authentication Service.
AuthServiceImpl
Implementation of the AuthService interface providing authentication business logic.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
JWT Authentication Filter that processes JWT tokens in incoming HTTP requests.
JwtUtil
Utility class for JWT token operations including generation, validation, and extraction.
MessageResponseDTO
Data Transfer Object for sending simple message responses from the API.
MyGlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the authentication service.
MyUserDetailsService
Custom implementation of Spring Security's UserDetailsService.
ResourceAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when attempting to create a resource that already exists.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger/OpenAPI documentation setup.
User
Entity class representing a User in the system.
UserConverter
Utility component for converting between User entities and DTOs.
UserLoginRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object for user login requests.
UserLoginResponseDTO
Data Transfer Object for user login responses.
UserNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested user is not found in the system.
UserRegisterRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object for user registration requests.
UserRegisterResponseDTO
Data Transfer Object for user registration responses.
UserRepository
Repository interface for User entity CRUD operations.
UserRole
Enumeration representing user roles in the system.
WebSecurityConfig
Web security configuration class for the Authentication Service.
